In {{SR|1463}} she married [[Thain]] [[Faramir Took I|Faramir I]], son of [[Peregrin Took]].{{App|Gamgee}} ==Etymology== Although the name refers to her hair, it is also in accordance to the Hobbit custom of giving flower-names to women.
